Commentary: Sohail Tanvir to Smith, 1 run, full and straight to start from Tanvir, driven up towards mid-off for a run. A bit of movement
Sohail Tanvir to Billings, no run, on a length outside off, in a channel. The ball moves away late and beats the bat. Beautiful lines
Sohail Tanvir to Billings, no run, walks down and drives to mid-on, use of the wrists.
Sohail Tanvir to Billings, no run, some more movement. Back of a length from Tanvir, moves away late. Billings wafts and is beaten
Sohail Tanvir to Billings, 1 run, he was always going to get an edge. This one goes down and trickles towards third man for a run
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, no run, lovely end. Good length outside off, some away movement. Smith opts to let this one go
Mohammad Irfan to Billings, no run, on the pads to start, Billings beaten for pace. Misses a flick and is struck on the pad
Mohammad Irfan to Billings, 1 run, on a length on middle, popped away towards mid-on. Goes uppish. A sign of a slow surface
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, no run, on a length around middle and leg, Smith plays it back. No tim9ng
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, 1 run, yikes, a low full toss on leg, worked away to deep square leg, should have been more than one there
Mohammad Irfan to Billings, 2 runs, runs down, gets a length delivery and works the ball through midwicket for a couple. Nice hands
Mohammad Irfan to Billings, no run, lovely solid defensive stroke to end a tight over
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, no run, good length delivery on and just outside off, beats the bat
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, no run, keeping it on a length around off, pushed up towards mid-off from the crease
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, 2 runs, full delivery on leg and middle, Smith opts for an ugly across-the-line hoick, squirted over backward point for a couple
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, no run, fullish delivery on middle and leg, played away towards mid-off
Sohail Tanvir to Smith, 1 run, on a length on middle and leg, inside-edged into the pad for a run
Sohail Tanvir to Billings, FOUR, nice hands again. Billings gets across, gets something full and straight and just flicks away behind square for four
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, FOUR, poor lines. Strays down leg and Smith helps himself to four past fine leg. Deft touch. Can't bowl there
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, no run, across-the-line mow on a length finds midwicket. No timing
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, FOUR, lucky. Gets in a good yorker on off, Smith drives but gets a thick inside edge which somehow evades the stumps and races away to the fine leg boundary
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, FOUR, a thwack over mid-on. Length on middle, Smith clears one leg and clears mid-on. A T20 stroke
Mohammad Irfan to Smith, 1 run, well played. Length on off and middle, cramped for room, works one to midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Billings, 1 run, nicely played. Lets the ball come to him and then opens the face to get one to third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, 1 run, length delivery outside off, Billings opens the face and guides one down to third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Smith, no run, good length outside off, but too much width. Smith misses a cut
Bilawal Bhatti to Smith, no run, hit from the crease to cover. Cramped for room
Bilawal Bhatti to Smith, 1 run, fullish delivery around off, pushed up to mid-off. With the fielder on the edge, a single is easy

Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, 4 leg byes, good length outside off, Billings gets right across, looking for a scoop. Misses by a considerable distance and is hit on the helmet. The ball ricochets away for four
Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, no run, shortish and wide from Bhatti, Billings this time fails to connect with a cut
Narine to Smith, FOUR, superb execution. Full from Narine, Smith gets across and executes a fine reverse paddle sweep. Past slip and to the boundary
Narine to Smith, 1 run, flat on middle, worked away to deep midwicket
Narine to Billings, FOUR, that will be four more. Short and wide from Narine, Billings cuts and the ball takes the outside edge, flies past short third man for four.
Narine to Billings, FOUR, four more. Narine getting a thrashing. Billings gets down low and plays a high-percentage stroke, clears backward square leg with a sweep. Nice.
Narine to Billings, 1 run, worked away towards square leg. Fantastic batting
Narine to Smith, no run, this one floats in, swerves in and beats Smith on the inside edge. Hit on the pad
Yasir Shah to Billings, 2 runs, some flight to start, tossed up outside off, carved up to deep cover
Yasir Shah to Billings, FOUR, four more. Billings runs down, gets the ball full, he wanted to go over cover but the ball skews off the outside half and clears backward point for four
Yasir Shah to Billings, 1 run, worked away to deep square leg, a flick of the wrists
Yasir Shah to Smith, 2 runs, pushed down to long-on towards Umar Akmal who lazily and sloppily allows one by fumbling a simple collection. What was he trying to do?
Yasir Shah to Smith, 1 run, short and wide, cut to deep point. Good fielding this time prevents two
Yasir Shah to Billings, 1 run, driven up to long-on
Narine to Billings, 1 run, flat delivery on middle and leg, clipped to deep square leg
Narine to Smith, 1 run, shovelled to deep midwicket from the crease
Narine to Billings, 1 run, flat on middle and off, clipped to deep midwicket
Narine to Smith, 2 runs, flat again on off, pushed to cover. McCullum concedes an overthrow with an unnecessary throw
Narine to Smith, 1 run, a leading edge, full. Smith plays too early, a leading edge lands safely, one to long-off
Narine to Billings, 1 run, cut to the deep point fielder. Exceptional batting, playing out the opposition's best
Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, no run, good length delivery on off, some extra bounce. Beats Billings' swipe. Hmm, a rare sight, some bounce
Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, SIX, that's huge. On a length from Bhatti this time, Billings backs away, gets a length delivery and swats the ball way over square leg. Easy
Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, no run, goes through again. Back of a length outside off, Billings backs away but can't reach this time.
Bilawal Bhatti to Billings, 1 run, well bowled. Fires in the yorker on middle, shovelled to long-on
Bilawal Bhatti to Smith, no run, more bounce. Digs this one in outside off, Smith arches his back, looks to go over third man. Fails to connect at all
Bilawal Bhatti to Smith, no run, on a length around off, blocked to cover. Good response from Bhatti

Elliott to Billings, OUT, bowled. Clean through. Full and straight from Elliott, Billings walks across, tries to scoop the ball over fine leg, one of his more productive strokes. If you're playing that shot, you have to connect though. Billings fails to, and the stumps are rattled. Key wicket
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run, hammered first ball to long-on. Why bother with feet movement? Clears his leg and nails his drive. Umar Akmal saves three

Elliott to Smith, OUT, one more. Elliott's doing it all. How about that stroke though? The team has just lost a wicket and Smith looks to clear midwicket with a wipe across the line. Elliott's stump to stump line means you have to make contact. Smith doesn't and the stumps are pinged once again.
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, driven away to the sweeper cover
Elliott to Haddin, no run, on a length outside off, Haddin misses a late dab
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run, executes the late cut this time, gets one to short third man
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, 1 run, full and straight, pushed away to mid-on
Bilawal Bhatti to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, on a length on off, dabbed away to point
Bilawal Bhatti to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, length on middle, Misbah gets on top of the bounce to defend
Bilawal Bhatti to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, worked away into the leg side for one to mid-on
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, no run, good change-up, the bouncer on off. Haddin lets this go through to the keeper
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, 1 run, fullish delivery on off and middle, squirted away to long-on
Narine to Haddin, 1 run, on a length on middle, worked to deep midwicket

Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, tossed up outside off, Misbah gets down on one knee and sweeps over square leg. Goes straight to deep backward square leg and the fielder messes up. Over-runs the ball and concedes extras
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, 2 runs, a low full toss, Misbah gets low and paddles fine to short fine leg
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run
Narine to Haddin, no run, flat and straight, defended
Narine to Haddin, 1 run, played away towards short third man for one. Good batting
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, 1 run, worked away towards square leg for a run
Bilawal Bhatti to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, on a length on off, the ball seaming back in, chopped away towards gully
Bilawal Bhatti to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, bouncer on off, Misbah hooks, gets a thick top edge which flies down to fine leg. Doesn't carry to the fielder
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, no run, well bowled. Full and straight, blocked
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, no run, overpitched delivery outside off, a badly-timed heave finds mid-off
Bilawal Bhatti to Haddin, 1 run, backs away and chops a cut towards point
Elliott to Haddin, 1 run, on the bounce. A low full toss outside off, bunted down to the fielder at long-off
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, pierces the gap straight. Full and straight, Misbah hammers the ball back from where it came. Over the bowler and between long-on and long-off
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, driven away to deep cover

Elliott to Haddin, OUT, and another one falls. Full and straight from Elliott, Haddin is too early through his leg-side mow. Gets a thick leading edge which settles in Yasir Shah's reverse-cupped hands at point. Just struggling a bit for timing now
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, low full toss on middle and leg, nudged to deep square leg for a run
Elliott to Watson, no run, nice finish from Elliott. Full and straight, blocked. Not much Watson could do with that actually
Wicket: ['BJ Haddin c Yasir Shah b Elliott 9 (15b 0x4 0x6) SR: 60.00']

Commentary: Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, good call from Watson. Flat and wide, driven up towards Baz at cover. A loud yelp of "noo"
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, cut away towards deep cover
Yasir Shah to Watson, 1 run, tossed up and straight, pushed back
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, shortish and wide, cut to point
Yasir Shah to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, worked away towards deep square leg from the crease. Not bothering with flight to Misbah, a good tactic
Yasir Shah to Watson, 1 run, short and wide, Watson hurries back and nails a cut to the sweeper cover
Elliott to Watson, 1 run, on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket. A lull in play
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, SIX, flicked for six. Shot! Gets right back in the crease, waits for a ball in his arc and then sends it sailing over midwicket. Sweet timing
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, wants another one. This one is a lot wider outside off though. Badly mis-times his lofted drive to long-on
Elliott to Watson, FOUR, awful delivery. Strays down leg and all Watson needs is some bat. That he gets. Flies down past short fine leg

Elliott to Watson, OUT, straight to the fielder! Slower delivery, pace off the ball. Watson wants to muscle the ball over long-on but it is never going to be easy on this surface. Doesn't get his timing right, doesn't get everything behind it and picks out Umar Akmal at long-on.
Elliott to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, overpitched outside off, driven to long-off for a run
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, short and wide from Narine, cut to deep point
Narine to Asif Ali, 1 run, the carrom ball, flat and wide, chopped to point
Wicket: ['SR Watson c Umar Akmal b Elliott 7 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 116.66']

Commentary: Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, short and wide again, not bowling it straight, thrashed to the sweeper cover

Narine to Asif Ali, OUT, slogged away straight to deep midwicket. Is that the best option? Flat delivery on middle, Asif Ali gets across and heaves the ball straight down to the fielder. Elliott takes a sitter.
Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, bowls this full on off, pushed away towards short midwicket. Narine gets across to cut it off

Narine to Misbah-ul-Haq, SIX, pitches this too full. Misbah clears his front leg and launches a muscular drive over long-on. Not the best of timing but his power takes it over the fielder. Not Narine's best day
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, a short slower ball down leg, helped along to short fine leg. Good batting, give Misbah strike
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, good delivery. Cramping Misbah for room with a tight delivery on a length. Misbah opens the face to get one to point
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, slower delivery on middle and leg, played away towards short fine leg

Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 2 runs, dug out for a couple to long-on? A yorker on middle and leg, jammed to Akmal at long-on whorushes in and hits the stumps directly at the bowler's end. But two has been completed
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, a slow bouncer outside off, Misbah has time to see it go past but opts not to play a stroke
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, SIX, six more for Misbah. Full and straight from Tanvir, Misbah gets across and nails a heave. Hangs in the air for a while but clears midwicket. Vital runs these
Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, 1 run, a yorker on middle and leg, pushed to long-on for a run, good clever batting this
Mohammad Irfan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, excellent yorker. Sublime execution. Nothing Misbah can do but jam it out
Mohammad Irfan to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, four more. Anticipates the yorker, goes deep in his crease. Gets a full toss and swings merrily through square leg for four
Mohammad Irfan to Misbah-ul-Haq, SIX, looking for the yorker again, misses his length and that's big. Goes deep in the crease and a heave clears midwicket. Fifty for Misbah too.
Mohammad Irfan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 leg bye, gets the yorker right this time. Full down leg, Misbah misses his whip and is hit on the pad, one leg bye to point. Sliding down

Mohammad Irfan to Shadab Khan, no run, misses the yorker again. Right in the slot for a boundary anywhere in the leg side. Anywhere in the field. A full toss on middle, Shadab misses his scoop and is struck on the body.
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, SIX, six more. Misbah rolling on and on and on. Goes deep in the crease, converts a yorker into something full and whips the ball over midwicket. Six more
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, oh no, Shadab. There was two easy. Worked away to deep square leg. The fielder's throw is wayward. Misbah was reads for two but the youngster sends him back
Sohail Tanvir to Shadab Khan, 1 run, slower delivery, pace off the ball. Clubbed down to long-on
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, full and wide, hit away to the sweeper cover. Misbah says no, thanks, I'll take the bowling. Refuses the single

Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, OUT, whipped away to deep midwicket for a run. Roy returns a good throw to the keeper. Both batsmen are stuck on the same end. The bails are removed just before the batsmen cross so Shadab will have go to. Misbah is not on strike anyway.
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Sami, OUT, out of the final ball. A slower ball outside off, Sami lofts the ball, more height than elevation, and picks out long-off
